codePut:
update GCRAACT 
set GCRAACT_GCVASTS_ID = :STATUS_ID,
GCRAACT_USER_RESPONSE_DATE = sysdate,
GCRAACT_ACTIVITY_DATE = sysdate
where gcraact_pidm = :parm_user_pidm
and gcraact_gcbactm_id = :id
codeGet:
SELECT ACTION_ITEM_ID "id", ACTION_ITEM_TITLE, ACTION_ITEM_CONTENT, 
(select count(status_id) from gvq_gcraisr where status_rule_action_item_id = :actionitemid and status_active_ind = 'Y') status_count
FROM GVQ_GCBACTM WHERE ACTION_ITEM_PAGE_NAME=:pageid
AND ACTION_ITEM_ID=:actionitemid
